thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 15 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Lundin Mining Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $‍0.18​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Lundin Mining Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $‍0.18​
text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - Lundin Mining Corp:
* LUNDIN MINING FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR RESULTS * QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $‍0.18​ * ‍PRODUCTION, CASH COST, CAPITAL EXPENDITURE AND EXPLORATION GUIDANCE FOR 2018 REMAINS UNCHANGED​
* SAYS 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES, EXCLUDING CAPITALIZED INTEREST, ARE EXPECTED TO BE $850 MILLION
* QTRLY ‍SALES $533.3 MILLION VERSUS $459.2​ MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.14, REVENUE VIEW $528.0 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
